row.entry: This module allows you to control how the demosaic is processed.

sect3.title: Usage
sect3.para: Demosaic is done on display only when zoom is greater than 50%.

sect4.title: edge threshold
sect4.para: Set the threshold for the median pass.

sect4.title: color smoothing
sect4.para: Number of passes for color smoothing.

sect4.title: match greens
sect4.para: Greens correction, useful for some camera.
